a.              monitor and record alerts and Security Events 24x7x365;
b.              classify alert and Security Event severity based on Customer approved SLA;
c.              provide initial assessment of all Security Events and Alerts;
d.              monitor and escalate all Security Events in accordance with applicable Service Levels
e.              make a first attempt at resolving or escalating the Security Event to the appropriate Customer contact
f.               continuously tune alerts and their severity, and provide recommendations to Customer about tuning
g.              own, monitor, track, and communicate Security Event summary and, where applicable, root cause reporting, and reports back to Customer
h.              receive and respond to escalation calls from Customer or Customer authorized technical field associates for any security-related issues;
i.                keep designated Provider, Customer and Customer authorized third party contacts informed on status and progress;
j.                receive and respond to escalation from any Provider, Customer or Customer’s authorized third-party help desk or support group for any security-related issues;
k.              provide Customer a portal view into currently open Security Event tickets and ad hoc reporting of any and all Security Events, Security Incidents and other security cases;

l.                produce and provide Customer with real-time, monthly, quarterly, and yearly reports by Customer-defined demographics detailing events received and resolved as well as current trends in our security environment, including attack vectors and case volumes;

m.            assisting Customer in conducting operational security reviews to assess Provider's processes and performance to determine effectiveness in meeting Customer's security requirements for  in-scope SOC services.
n.              responsible for the provision of services related to Customer's security requirements, which are set in place by Customer to govern the security of Customer’s Environment
